channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Honeywell Plans to Spin Off Advanced Materials Business
item.description: The move is part of the chief executive’s plan to simplify the business around three core trends.

item.title: The next Social Security COLA increase won’t be enough to solve this crisis.
item.description: Millions of older adults already can’t afford housing, food or healthcare.

item.title: Qualcomm’s stock isn’t the AI play that it was expected to be, analyst says
item.description: Shares of Qualcomm Inc. took a hit Tuesday after KeyBanc Capital dropped its longtime buy call, saying the semiconductor maker hasn’t been benefiting ...

item.title: Retirees may not be getting their money’s worth from a financial adviser. How to know if it’s time to find a new one.
item.description: Advisers who excel in helping clients build their nest egg may be less skilled at addressing Social Security or drawdown strategies.

item.title: S&P Gains While Tumult Grips Chinese Stocks
item.description: U.S. stocks mostly ticked higher while Hong Kong’s Hang Seng Index, which had surged recently while the mainland was on holiday, suffered its worst pu...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Slip as Storm Approaches
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were holding near support around $2.70 with the market attentive as Hurricane Milton moves toward Florida.

item.title: Pfizer CEO's Job Is at Risk. A Shot of Discipline Could Help.
item.description: As activist Starboard teams up with former Pfizer executives, the pharma giant’s lack of focus is in the spotlight.

item.title: A Less Glamorous Group of Stocks Steps Into the Spotlight
item.description: Earnings from the utilities, materials and industrials sectors could offer more signs of a broadening market rally.

item.title: WeightWatchers’ stock soars after adding compounded GLP-1 treatment to its offering

item.title: Brent falls below $80 on talk of Lebanon-Israel ceasefire
item.description: A rally in oil prices took a pause on Tuesday as militant group Hezbollah reportedly said it supports efforts by Lebanon toward a ceasefire with Israe...
